name: nfs1f
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

comment: If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` , it is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
